name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character.

v0.1.0
- First release with 57 cards, 4 relics

v0.1.1
- Fixed Light! having incorrect Block value during combat.

v0.1.2
- Fixed Rusty Pipe not upgrading.
- Fixed Shadow! not dealing double damage after using Light!.
- Fixed Flower Power going up to 3 cost when fully upgraded. It now costs 1.

v0.1.3
- Buffed Rusty Pipe's damage by 1.
- Tooltips were added to Magic Lamp and Flaming Bottle.
- Changed some texts slightly.

v0.1.4
- Fix bug where the game softlock when you got Alchemy Bag as other characters.
